title: Always the Wedding Singer, Finally the Bride
description: Maggie Doherty attended a lot of weddings as an entertainer. So when she married Josh Zager, there was no doubt what the focus would be.
dc:creator: Alyson Krueger

media:content.media:credit: Cindy Schultz for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Maggie Doherty serenades Josh Zager during their wedding reception. The two were married Oct. 9 at Anneâ€™s Washington Inn in Saratoga Springs, N.Y.
